title: Touchbar 13 inch mid 2017 slow and fan spin fast
message: Our Costumer spilled some tea in his macbook. The touchbar was damaged, we replaced it. Now the second problem are the fans. They are spinning fast, and the macbook is super slow. There is no obvious corrosion on the board. I would guess its a sens line ? or could it be the replaced touchbar wich isnt genuine? any ideas?

title: Touchbar 13 inch mid 2017 slow and fan spin fast
message: Run HWMonitor and see which sensor is reading high

title: Touchbar 13 inch mid 2017 slow and fan spin fast
Touchbar 13 inch mid 2017 slow and fan spin fast
message:
There are two unusual tempratures in HW monitor: Heatpipe incoming air 128C and Heatpipe Outgoing Air 128C.
If i run ASD on the device it tells me that something with the SMC is wrong.(CODE: PFM006)

title: Touchbar 13 inch mid 2017 slow and fan spin fast
message:
ASD on 2017 machine?
Which code 820-xxxx has your board?
Try known good trackpad board/flex...

title: Touchbar 13 inch mid 2017 slow and fan spin fast
message: Im sorry It was not ASD, its AHT

title: Touchbar 13 inch mid 2017 slow and fan spin fast
message: It was the Trackpad! Thank you guys for your help! appriciate that
